detaileddescription.para:
Set uart baudrate.
Param type : uint32_t
Param usage : uart baudrate, must above zero. Here is a list of possible baudrates
Return value explanation :

Get current device status
Param type : uint32_t *
Param usage : store result of current status
Return value explanation :

Enable uart device
Param type : NULL
Param usage : param is not required
Return value explanation :

Disable uart device, when device is disabled, only UART_CMD_ENA_DEV, UART_CMD_DIS_DEV and UART_CMD_GET_STATUS commands can be executed, other commands will return E_SYS
Param type : NULL
Param usage : param is not required
Return value explanation :

Flush uart device output
Param type : NULL
Param usage : param is not required
Return value explanation :

Get how many bytes space in uart are available to transmit, this can be used in interrupt callback functions, cooperate with uart_write API to realize non-blocked write
Param type : int32_t *
Param usage : store the write available bytes, > 0 for available bytes, 0 for not available
Return value explanation :

Get how many bytes in uart are available to receive, this can be used in interrupt callback functions, cooperate with uart_read API to realize non-blocked read
Param type : int32_t *
Param usage : store the read available bytes, > 0 for available bytes, 0 for not available
Return value explanation :

Cause a break condition to be transmitted to the receiving device
Param type : NULL
Param usage : param is not required
Return value explanation :

Clear break condition and return to normal
Param type : NULL
Param usage : param is not required
Return value explanation :

Change uart D/P/S(Data/Parity/Stop) format
Param type : UART_DPS_FORMAT *
Param usage : uart dps format including databits, parity and stopbits
Return value explanation :

Set uart device hardware flow control
Param type : UART_HW_FLOW_CONTROL
Param usage : uart dps format including databits, parity and stopbits
Return value explanation :

Set uart transmit success callback function when all required bytes are transmitted for interrupt method
Param type : DEV_CALLBACK * or NULL
Param usage : transmit success callback function for uart
Return value explanation :

Set uart receive success callback function when all required bytes are received for interrupt method
Param type : DEV_CALLBACK * or NULL
Param usage : receive success callback function for uart
Return value explanation :

Set uart transfer error callback function when something error happened for interrupt method
Param type : DEV_CALLBACK * or NULL
Param usage : transfer error callback function for uart
Return value explanation :

Set transmit buffer via interrupt, and it will set tx_buf
Param type : DEV_BUFFER * or NULL
Param usage : buffer structure pointer, if param is NULL, then it will set tx_buf to NULL
Return value explanation :

Set receive buffer via interrupt, and it will set rx_buf
Param type : DEV_BUFFER * or NULL
Param usage : buffer structure pointer, if param is NULL, then it will set rx_buf to NULL
Return value explanation :

Enable or disable transmit interrupt
Param type : uint32_t
Param usage : enable(none-zero) or disable(zero) flag
Return value explanation :

Enable or disable receive interrupt
Param type : uint32_t
Param usage : enable(none-zero) or disable(zero) flag
Return value explanation :

Abort current interrupt transmit operation if tx interrupt enabled, it will disable transmit interrupt, and set DEV_IN_TX_ABRT in status variable, and call the transmit callback function, when tx callback is finished, it will clear DEV_IN_TX_ABRT and return
Param type : NULL
Param usage :
Return value explanation :

Abort current interrupt receive operation if rx interrupt enabled, it will disable receive interrupt, and set DEV_IN_TX_ABRT in status variable, and call the receive callback function, when rx callback is finished, it will clear DEV_IN_TX_ABRT and return
Param type : NULL
Param usage :
Return value explanation :
Set extra information pointer of uart info
Get extra information pointer of uart info
UART Device Hardware Flow Control Types Enum
informations about uart open count, working status, baudrate, uart registers and ctrl structure, uart dps format

Define uart device interface, like uart information structure, provide functions to open/close/control uart, send/receive data by uart
All this details are implemented by user in user porting code

briefdescription.para: get an uart device by uart device id. For how to use uart device hal refer to Functions in uart device structure

detaileddescription.para:
uart_id
id of uart, defined by user
!NULL
pointer to an uart device structure
NULL
failed to find the uart device by uart_id
need to implemented by user in user code get one designware device structure
Provide common definitions for uart device, then software developer can develop uart driver following this definitions, and the applications can directly call this definition to realize functions
